thread.title: KAYLA
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by KAYLA

author: KAYLA
title: KAYLA
text: I had a great experience at the Home Zone in Mesquite, very well trained employees and a great selection to choose from. Let's not forget the reasonable prices! I haven't received my new couch yet, but if it's going to be anything like the rest of my experience I can only foresee good things :)
